trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> objects in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> em um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objects in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> classe é usada para armazenar e gerenciar uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objetos em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> class as the underlying data type of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> controlar usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> classe como o tipo de dados subjacente a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> property provides additional style choices in addition to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicMenuStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> propriedade fornece opções de estilo adicionais além do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicMenuStyle%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The first style in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection corresponds to the submenu style for the first level of the menu.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro estilo no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> coleção corresponde ao estilo submenu para o primeiro nível do menu.

trans-unit.source: The second style in the collection corresponds to the submenu style for the second level of the menu, and so on.
trans-unit.target: O segundo estilo na coleção corresponde ao estilo submenu para o segundo nível do menu e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> property is most often used to generate a navigation menu, like a Web site map, where menu items at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> propriedade geralmente é usada para gerar um menu de navegação, como um mapa de site da Web, onde os itens de menu em um determinado nível devem ter a mesma aparência, independentemente de terem submenus.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> class inherits most of its members from the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> maioria de seus membros de classe é herdada de <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> classe.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the inherited members, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os membros herdados, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> class to specify the style settings for the submenus in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control based on the submenu's level.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> classe para especificar as configurações de estilo dos submenus em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> controle com base no nível do submenu.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> property returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> propriedade retorna um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> instance to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> a ser adicionada à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds a submenu style to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um estilo de submenu à coleção de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The position in the collection at which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> instance was inserted.
trans-unit.target: A posição na coleção na qual a instância de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> foi inserida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.OnInsert%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> methods are called before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> instance is added to the collection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A> method is called after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> instance is added.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.OnInsert%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> métodos são chamados antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> instância é adicionada à coleção e o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A> método é chamado após o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> instância é adicionada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> instance to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> a ser localizada na coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection contains a specific <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a coleção de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> contém uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> específica.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> instance is found in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a instância de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> for encontrada na coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="null" /> is passed as the <paramref name="style" /> parameter, <see langword="false" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se <see langword="null" /> for passado para o parâmetro <paramref name="style" />, <see langword="false" /> será retornado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called to validate the `style` parameter before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection is checked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> método é chamado para validar o `style` parâmetro antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> coleção é verificada.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> objects copied from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: A matriz unidimensional que é o destino dos objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> copiados da coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <c>array</c> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: A <c>matriz</c> deve ter indexação com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero na <c>array</c> na qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection to an array, starting at a specified array index.
trans-unit.target: Copia o conteúdo de uma coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> para uma matriz, começando em um índice de matriz especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objects are copied to the destination array in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objetos forem copiados para a matriz de destino na mesma ordem em que o enumerador que itera por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> coleção.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> é multidimensional

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is greater than or equal to the length of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> é maior que ou igual ao comprimento da <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: The number of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> objects in the source <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection is greater than the available space from the <paramref name="index" /> to the end of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: O número de objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> na coleção de origem <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> é maior do que o espaço disponível do <paramref name="index" /> até o final do <paramref name="array" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: The index of the data type to create.
trans-unit.target: O índice do tipo de dados a criar.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used in this implementation of the method; therefore, you should always pass in <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Esse parâmetro não é usado nesta implementação do método; portanto, você sempre deve passar <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> of the data type that corresponds to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> do tipo de dados que corresponde ao índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Always returns an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> vazio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.CreateKnownType%2A> method is a helper function that is used to create an <xref:System.Object> of the data type that corresponds to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.CreateKnownType%2A> método é uma função auxiliar que é usada para criar um <xref:System.Object> do tipo de dados que corresponde ao índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The index is often determined by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> method to create an array of supported data types and then searching the array for the desired data type.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente, o índice é determinado por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> método para criar uma matriz de tipos de dados com suporte e, em seguida, pesquisa de matriz para o tipo de dados desejado.

trans-unit.source: The `index` parameter is not used in this implementation of the method and is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O `index` parâmetro não é usado nesta implementação do método e será ignorado.

trans-unit.source: You should always pass in `null` for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: Você sempre deve passar em `null` para esse parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the method always returns an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> object.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação do método sempre retornará um elemento <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This method is used only by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado somente por desenvolvedores de controle.

trans-unit.source: Creates an array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects that contains the supported data types of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.Type" /> que contêm os tipos de dados compatíveis da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects that contains the data types supported by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objetos que contêm os tipos de dados compatíveis com a classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> method is a helper function that is used to create an array of data types supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> método é uma função auxiliar que é usada para criar uma matriz de tipos de dados compatíveis com o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> classe.

trans-unit.source: The array is often searched to determine the index of a desired data type.
trans-unit.target: A matriz geralmente é pesquisada para determinar o índice de um tipo de dados desejado.

trans-unit.source: The index is then passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.CreateKnownType%2A> method to create an <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=nameWithType> of the corresponding data type.
trans-unit.target: O índice é então passado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.CreateKnownType%2A> método para criar um <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=nameWithType> do tipo de dados correspondente.

trans-unit.source: This method is used only by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado somente por desenvolvedores de controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> object to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> a ser localizado na coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines the location of a specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> object in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina o local de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> especificado na coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> object if it is found in the list; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice do objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> especificado, se encontrado na lista; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called to validate the `style` parameter before the index is returned.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> método é chamado para validar o `style` parâmetro antes do índice é retornado.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> object should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> deve ser inserido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> object to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> a ser inserido na coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> object into the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Insere um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> na coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: If index is -1, `style` is inserted at the beginning of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o índice é -1, `style` é inserido no início de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> coleção.

trans-unit.source: If index equals the number of items in the collection, `style` is appended to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o índice é igual ao número de itens na coleção, `style` é acrescentado ao final do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called to validate the style parameter before it is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> método é chamado para validar o parâmetro de estilo antes de ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.OnInsert%2A> method is called before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> object is inserted into the collection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A> method is called after the object is inserted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.OnInsert%2A> método é chamado antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objeto será inserido na coleção e o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A> método é chamado depois que o objeto é inserido.

trans-unit.source: The specified <paramref name="index" /> is outside the range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="index" /> especificado está fora do intervalo da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: A coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: The specified <paramref name="style" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="style" /> especificado é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The location of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> object in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: O local do objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> na coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> object at the specified index in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência ao objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> no índice especificado no objeto da coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência ao objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count" /> property value.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro de índice é menor que zero ou maior ou igual ao valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which <c>value</c> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero no qual o <c>valor</c> deve ser inserido.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser inserido na coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Called before the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Add(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Insert(System.Int32,System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle)" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: Chamado antes dos métodos <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Add(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle)" /> e <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Insert(System.Int32,System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.OnInsert%2A> method is called before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Insert%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.OnInsert%2A> método é chamado antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Add%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Insert%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.OnInsert%2A> method in custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> classes to perform custom processing of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objects before they are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.OnInsert%2A> método personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> classes para executar processamento personalizado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objetos antes de serem adicionados para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> coleção.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> não é do tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> a ser removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> object from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove a primeira ocorrência do objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> especificado da coleção de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called to validate the style parameter before it is used to locate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> object to remove from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> método é chamado para validar o parâmetro de estilo antes que ele é usado para localizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objeto ser removido do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A> method is called before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> object is removed, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A> method is called after the object is removed from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A> método é chamado antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objeto for removido e o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A> método é chamado depois que o objeto é removido do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: A coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O local do índice de base zero do objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> a ser removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> object at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Remove o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> no local especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A> method is called before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> object is removed from the collection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A> method is called after the object is removed from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A> método é chamado antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objeto é removido da coleção e o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A> método é chamado depois que o objeto é removido do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: A coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is equal to or greater than <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> é igual a ou maior que <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count" />.

trans-unit.source: The object that should serialize itself completely.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que deve serializar-se completamente.

trans-unit.source: Instructs a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> object contained by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection to record its entire state to view state.
trans-unit.target: Instrui um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> contido pela coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> a registrar todo o seu estado no estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A> method is called internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Add%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Insert%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A> método é chamado internamente pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Add%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Insert%2A> métodos.
